attributes.action: The people of the UK wish a full Royal Commission independent of the government
attributes.additional_details: The people of the UK are being more and more schocked with the Headlines this Goverment is making with its mismanagement of the Public money being used to combat the pandemic, and the Prime ministers refusal to replace Ministers found guilty of not doing their ministerial duty
attributes.background: We the people of the UK would like to see a full Royal Commission set up and it must be entirely and demonstrably independent of this government and investigate this govenrments response and handling of this Covid Pandemic

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Launch a judge-led public inquiry into the Covid-19 pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577292
